sentence.Network_en: He tumbled his clothes helterskelter into his suitcase.
sentence.Network_cn: 他手忙脚乱地把衣服塞入手提箱里.

sentence.Network_en: Everything in the room was helterskelter.

PerfectNetExp.abs: helter 黑尔特, helterskelter 手忙脚乱, helterskelter 乱堆
helten 黑尔滕, helterskelter 乱堆, helter 黑尔特

entry.tran: 匆促忙乱的;杂乱无章的
entry.def: You use helter-skelter to describe something that is hurried and disorganized, especially when things happen very quickly, one after the other.

example.ex: He now faces another crisis in his helter-skelter existence.
example.tran: 他乱糟糟的生活中现在又面临着另一个危机。

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
